question:
You are currently taking a course at a college but you will need to have a week off during this course.
Write a letter to the college Principal. In the letter
give details of your course
explain why you need a week off
say what you want the Principal to do.
text: My name is Artem and I am a student in the computer science course. I am writing in connection with getting approval from your to be absent for a week in the next month.

As I already mentioned, I am studying in the computer science class, where we hone database skills. I was explained that it is not possible to miss classes at all without the approval of the head of the course of the Principal of the University. The bottom line, I need to go home due to some family matters. The problem is that the head of my course is on vacation right now. This is the reason you are the only person who can approve my days off.

If it suited you, I could schedule a meeting with you during the upcoming week. It would be an honor to meet you in person, discuss my problem and sign all of the papers I need to be able officially a few days at the university. If you have any questions, you could reach me with my phone number +14383416040.

error_list.error_des: It seems that you are missing a verb. Consider adding it.
The spelling of honor is a non-British variant. For consistency, consider replacing it with the British English spelling.
